titleStmt.title: Quær's to be propounded to the most ingenious of each county in my travels through England
titleStmt.author: Plot, Robert, 1640-1696.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: R. P. = Robert Plot.
An outline of the questionnaire Robert Plot designed for his proposed surveys of the counties of England and Wales; only the Staffordshire volume was published (1686). Cf. Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
